ComicInfo.Title: The Vengeance Trail - Part 3: Chasing Dreams
ComicInfo.Summary:
Aric is unarmed and face-to-face with an angry dinosaur! Can he stay alive long enough for Ken to work his wiles and return control of the X-O armor to him? Meanwhile, Randy and the Wolfbridge group corner the deadly assassin named Snakebite and find out once and for all who it is that wants them all dead!
Valiant Sneak Peek bonus card originally included.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-09 14:18:01. [Issue ID 96217]
